review: Will probably give it a 5th star when they add HBO Now

review: You have to pay for everything and it is expensive. You might as well keep your cable.
author: Nina McLoyd

review: I am very pleased with this product so far. I am able to seamlessly use other apps I am currently subscribed to. I have not used it in other locations yet but I am anticipating being thrilled with the mobility of it.
author: Angela Weise

review: Does its job great investment difinitely would buy more for x mas gifts for people

review: Easy to use, small and affordable. Lots of versatility too. It went beyond my expectations.
author: Casey Gardner
